content: Look like More Disappointed To My self,Modern or Future Is same Worst,Forget It What I say
i love the game but where it falls short is that I have no idea where I'm up to atm and no quest log or anything as a reminder
Would like an update to finish out the anime series otherwise fairly well
Would rate a full 5 except for a problem with an unlockable near the end and lack of response from support. Edit:been 3 months still no response from dev

Stability on the game is HORRIBLE, been out over a year and still is not fixed. You don't have control on farming like you think in other games. Sure, anime it was story driven with fights, BUT THIS IS A GAME! You add that to OUR time. Save your money, not worth it right now, probably ever if they have not fixed it in over a year.
Pretty good but railroaded me at the end and after the credits i couldn't continue to play and or visit villages
I would rate 1 star for it just being a rpg maker game, but otherwise I like the Anime so I will only do 4 stars
Wish it let you do more of your own thing. Can't grind at all. Love the anime and the concept is there. Fighting is solid, but repetitive.
When can we expect an update?
Not to sound like a burden but is it going to get a update
Reminds me of the Gameboy days when I used to play Pokemon FireRed and it plays well and has some good artwork
It was good just kinda short hope it gets updated like it says it will.
Great game. Wish it would have more of the story though
Needs a map, to know were to go
Needs to be updated with the rest of season 1 at least
Thought this is suppose to follow the anime freedom to train as long as you want to is not given this takes the freedom to control the game like most rpgs.
I love it. Never watched Rising of the Shield Hero but it was epic ðŸ–’ðŸ–’ðŸ–’
It was nice. I enjoyed it. Can't wait for the update to include the next wave. Hope you make the controls a bit bigger.
I update my frimware on samsung 3 hour ago,. And the save file in this game is GONE. :(. Fix this please . Im alredy on stage melty pertend got kidnap.

12.99 for this ? At least it could go until the end of the anime because this is what it is based off of. But nope. HUGE CASH GRAB ON THIS ONE . Can not explain how dissapointed i am in this game low graphics mild game play and just a lack of anything that says 'we tried' . I want my money back. !!!!!!!!!!!
It is a good game but wish they would add all seasons not just season 1
Very fun, although remembering what you need to do in game can be troublesome.
Make it longer I already beat it
Great
I would like it if you could fix the lagging, but not bad, and if you want an explanation, it's laggy on Android mobile device as far as I know, but great on PC, plz fix this
Its good the game but need fixing lag for running around grass and city. And it need to fix controls. A and B buttons. Please kadokawa fix!!
